title: SAS Secure Tomorrow RePack By R.G Revenants NASWARI+ZOHAIB
description:
GENERAL INFORMATION:
Released: 2008
Genre: Action / 3D / 1st persoon
Developer: CITY Interactive
Publisher: CITY Interactive
Publication Type: RePack
Platform: PC
Game Version: 1.00.304.0
Language: Russian [ND / NeoGame] / English
Language voice: Russian [ND] / English
Medicine: SKiDROW

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:
Operating system: Windows XP / Vista / 7
Processor: Intel Pentium 4 2,4 GHz / AMD Athlon 64 2400 +
Memory: 1 GB
Video Card: Nvidia Geforce 7600 / Radeon X1600 - 256 MB
Sound device: compatible with DirectX
Hard disk space: 6.5 GB

DESCRIPTION:
The fight against terrorism - not just individual intelligence operations. This is a real war, and staff units of special purpose SAS understand the value of each mission like no other! After all, there is at least one terrorist to escape deserved punishment, as will rally around him, hundreds of fighters. And that moment has come! The head of a major international group escaped from the heavily guarded prison. He wants revenge and is preparing a terrible blow to the base of which is to shake all the countries of the West.
It's time to take the battle to the enemy! Pursue the enemy of rebel prisoners, destroy the militants in central London and the snow-covered ice bar Greenland. Release the hostages, using the original equipment men of Detachment SAS - night vision goggles, mask and stun grenades. Try your hand at an exciting multiplayer game with simultaneous support for up to 16 players. And remember: You're standing on guard of the future of mankind!
